name: Swervey Chicken
description:
Play as one of two chickens in a thrilling adventure as you swerve between your prey and collect seeds along the way to increase your score. At the end of each level, you will be prompted with math problems in order to move on to the next level.

Zach Kelley - Coder

Chandler Calkins - Sound

Marcus Owens - Graphics

Research:

   Dong Tau Chicken:
